games.name: Super Mario All-Stars
games.challenge: Fastest time to beat 1-1 in all four games.

games.name: Street Fighter III: 3rd Strike
games.challenge: Both contestants select 3 characters and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win with a character, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch to any of your available characters. First to win with all 3 characters wins the match.

games.name: Streets of Rage 2
games.challenge: Fastest time to complete Stage 1, Hardest, Original Life only (dying ends your run). If both players fail to finish, the player that got the furthest wins.

games.name: Rhythm Heaven Touchless
games.challenge: Three Remix's randomly selected by the referee. A Superb earn you a point. If after three remixes, the score is a tie, a tiebreaker with Coin Toss will be done.

games.name: Gran Turismo 4
games.challenge: NTSC Arcade Time Trial, BMW M3 `04, Sports Hard tires, power/weight tune at 0%. Do a lap on Nurburgring Nordschleife. Driving aids, cutting the track and crashing is permitted. Gamepad only.

games.name: Mickey's Wild Adventure
games.challenge: Fastest time to clear The Mad Doctor, starting at Steamboat Willie (Hard difficulty).

games.name: Donkey Kong Country
games.challenge: Fastest time to beat Master Necky Senior & King K. Rool, after clearing Platform Perils and collecting all the KONG letters in that stage.

games.name: Metal Slug X
games.challenge: Fastest time to finish the first 3 missions on 1 credit. If both players fail to finish, the player that got the furthest wins.

games.name: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas
games.challenge: Fastest time to clear Wrong Side of the Tracks.

games.name: Super Dodge Ball
games.challenge: One match (In-Game Bo3) with the team of your choice against your opponent.

games.name: Super Puzzle Fighter 2 Turbo
games.challenge: Both contestants select 2 non-hidden characters and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win a Bo3 with a character, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch characters. First to win a Bo3 with both characters wins the match. Level 3 (default) only.

games.name: Road Rash
games.challenge: Fastest time on The Peninsula (Thrash Mode Level 5). If both players get busted, the furthest distance wins.

games.name: Windjammers
games.challenge: Both contestants select 3 characters and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win a Bo3 with a character, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch to any of your available characters. First to win a Bo3 with all 3 characters wins the match. Start on Beach, loser selects next stage.

games.name: Ninja Gaiden
games.challenge: Fastest time to defeat Basaquer starting at Stage 1 without getting a Game Over. If both players fail to finish, the player that got the furthest wins.

games.name: Typing of the Dead
games.challenge: Fastest time to clear the Final Exam drill.

games.name: Kirby: Nightmare in Dream Land
games.challenge: Fastest time to beat the Boss Endurance.

games.name: Street Hoop
games.challenge: Both contestants select 3 teams and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win with a team, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch to any of your available teams. First to win with all 3 teams wins the match.

games.name: Dance Dance Revolution: 5th Mix
challenge: BO3 - Highest Score Wins (Single - Maniac - EX Scoring. Perfect X2 Points - Great X1 Point)

games.name: Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow
games.challenge: Fastest time to clear The Realm of the Dead and defeat the final boss. Normal Difficulty. Password: HRTGDV

games.name: Ape Escape
games.challenge:
Bo5 Time Attack:
Fossil Field
Hot Springs
Crumbling Castle
TV Tower
Sushi Temple

games.name: Simpsons, The: Road Rage
games.challenge: In Road Rage, earn the most amount of money on Evergreen Terrace (Hard Difficulty). Unlockable cars allowed.

games.name: Jaki Crush
games.challenge: Highest score until running out of balls OR auto-submits after 7 minutes (High Ball Speed).

games.name: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes
games.challenge: Both contestants select 3 teams of 2 non-secret fighters, as well as the 3 assists that will be used (no repeats, secrets allowed), and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win with a team/assist, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch to any of your available teams/assists. First to win with all 3 teams wins the match.

games.name: Pokemon Showdown
challenge: Bo3 with 1 match per following categories:

games.name: Neo Bomberman
games.challenge: Both contestants select 3 characters and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win a Bo3 with a character, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch to any of your available characters. First to win a Bo3 with all 3 characters wins the match.

games.name: Donkey Kong 64
games.challenge: Fastest time to beat Army Dillo and collecting the key after entering Jungle Japes for the first time.

games.name: Armored Core
games.challenge: Beat the mission Stop Gas Exposure in the quickest time possible. Build the mech you want to use before the event. Each participant gets 2 tries to get the lowest time. In case of ex-aequo, winner is determined by who has the more health left at the end.

games.name: Hamtaro Ham-Ham Games
games.challenge: Bo13 with the following games: 100 HM Dash - Hammer Throw - Diving - Hurdles - Bird-back Riding - Pole Vault - Carrot Pull - Swimming - Archery - Sailing - Triple Jump - Synchronized Swimming - Marathon

games.name: DoDonPachi DaiOuJou
games.challenge: Highest Score Without Dying / Auto-submit after 7 minutes.

games.name: Super Smash Bros. Melee (Slippi)
games.challenge: Both contestants select 3 characters and submit these ahead of the match to the referee. If you win a stock fight with a character, you may not use them again. If you lose, you are free to switch to any of your available characters. First to win with all 3 characters wins the match.

games.name: Mega Man Zero
games.challenge: Clear the final mission by defeating Copy X in the fastest time.

games.name: Neo Turf Masters
games.challenge: First player to get 5 hole wins over the other player in Match Play. Course is randomly generated by the referee.

games.name: Mario Superstar Baseball (Project Rio)
games.challenge: Project Rio (Rules T.B.D.)
